mapper.select:
SELECT ichannelId, chl. LABEL AS channelName, isubject, sj. LABEL AS subjectName, SUM (itotalpage :: integer) totalPage,
FROM stat.tab_city_tvprogram_rounds_week T32 LEFT JOIN basicinfo.tab_tv_info tv ON T32.tvid = tv.tvid AND tvtype = 1 INNER JOIN dim_channel chl ON T32.ichannelid = chl.chid INNER JOIN dim_subject sj ON T32.isubject = sj.sid WHERE 1 = 1 AND T32.iareaid = #{areaId} AND T32.ichannelid IN (#{channelId})
AND tv.subject IN
#{subjectId}
AND T32.avg_c_0_rate IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ichannelid, isubject, channelName, subjectName ORDER BY ichannelid, isubject

SELECT ichannelid, chl. LABEL AS channelName, T32.iareaid, cy. LABEL areaName,
FROM stat.tab_city_tvprogram_rounds_week T32 LEFT JOIN basicinfo.tab_tv_info tv ON T32.tvid = tv.tvid AND tvtype = 1 INNER JOIN dim_channel chl ON chl.chid = T32.ichannelid INNER JOIN dim_city cy ON cy.cid = T32.iareaid WHERE 1 = 1 AND T32.ichannelid IN (${channelId})
AND (T32.iareaid IN ( SELECT UNNEST (cg.cids) FROM dim_city_group cg WHERE cg.cgid = ${cityGroupId} ) OR T32.iareaid = ${cityGroupId})
AND T32.iareaid = ${cityId}
AND tv.subject IN
#{subjectId}
AND T32.avg_c_0_rate IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ichannelid, chl. LABEL, T32.iareaid, cy. LABEL ORDER BY rate DESC, ichannelid
